item.title: Abandoned wreck, 18th February
item.description:
This van has been dumped outside Hurricane House for around 4 months. It is partially blocking the pavement and wasting already limited availible parking spaces.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Master Gunner Place, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: One owner one social housing flat, 18th February
item.description:
This is just 5 cars and 1 RV in the pictures, also owns a further 1 car. 2 cars move the other 5 stay sat stationery for years now. 7 vehicles in total. One flat occupancy social housing. Blocking Gas meters along with a large amount of tyres blocking the fire exits. When told they move for a few weeks then return them all back. London fire brigade have done a report at Forest Hill. MPs are also involved. This will be published in the local paper because no matter how many times this is put to the council over a span of about 20years now, nothing has been done and just further more vehicles added. When resident is approached they simply do not care and feels entitled to use 7 spaces on a residential parking estate. I just hope a fire does not occur because there will be a lot of people/councils responsible. Especially, as the RV is going to make it hard access for a hose and the other cars stationery blocking a fire engine from parking close, the tyres being very flammable. Have we learnt nothing from the Grenfill case

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fambridge Close, Perry Vale, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned vehicle been there for a year at least, 18th February
item.description:
This FORD van reg BA66CZK has ben standing outside 11 Church Road Erith for at least a year I have checked with DVLA and is road taxed. I contacted the police and they advised me to report this to you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
